description: The REFERRAL_DX table contains diagnosis information stored with referrals.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the diagnosis associated with the referral. For example, if a referral has two associated diagnoses, the first diagnosis will have a line value of 1, while the second diagnosis will have a line value of 2.

columns.name: DX_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the diagnosis associated with the referral. This is not the diagnosis code.  NOTE: Link to CLARITY_EDG to get the diagnosis code.

columns.name: DX_TEXT
columns.description: Free text associated with each additional diagnosis (I RFL 1000).

columns.name: DX_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the code type of the additional diagnosis


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Unspecified diagnosis


Referral diagnosis


Secondary diagnosis


Additional diagnosis


Action diagnosis


Temporary diagnosis


Course diagnosis


Procedure


X-ray examination
